title: Energy Healing and Wellness — The Breath Is Life Spa
description: At The Breathe is Life Spa, we focus on healing your mind, body, and spirit. We offer therapeutic, chakra cleansing, lymphatic cleansing, and holistic healing services, to the Greater New Orleans area.
cleaned_text: Energy Healing Healing comes in a variety of forms. Which is best for you? Energy-based approaches to health and healing broaden and improve our capability to care for our clients holistically—vis-à-vis the mind, body, and spirit. These therapies emphasize caring for the whole person, interacting with and influencing the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual health.
